price: الله [با نعمت اسلام] بر ما منت نهاد و ما را از عذاب سوزان [دوزخ] محافظت کرد.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
